frameset.edef: to eat at someone/dominate someone's thoughts

role.argrole: experiencer (usually described as location marked with في)

example.parse: (S (S (CONJ و) (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يحز) (PP (PREP في) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN النفس))) (NP-SBJ (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM الفرز) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_NOM النافر)) (NP-ADV (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC بين) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN اعضاء) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الفريق) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN الحكومي) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN الواحد))))))) (PUNC .)

arg.g: the exclusionary screening between the members of the single governmental group

example.arg: الفرز النافر بين اعضاء الفريق الحكومي الواحد

verb.comment: EGYPTIAN ARABIC Framefile based on Haz~-u
